xml.data:
Home » 29Dhs Dhammasaṅgaṇīpāḷi » 2 Niddesa » 2.3 Nikkhepakaṇḍa » 2.3.3 Suttantikadukanikkhepa
2.3.3.19 Āpattikusalatāduka
Niddesa
Nikkhepakaṇḍa
Suttantikadukanikkhepa
Āpattikusalatāduka
1336.
2041Tattha katamā āpattikusalatā? Pañcapi āpattikkhandhā āpattiyo, sattapi āpattikkhandhā āpattiyo. Yā tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ āpattikusalatā paññā pajānanā…pe…  amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi—  ayaṃ vuccati āpattikusalatā.
1337.
2042Tattha katamā āpattivuṭṭhānakusalatā? Yā tāhi āpattīhi vuṭṭhānakusalatā paññā pajānanā…pe…  amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi—  ayaṃ vuccati āpattivuṭṭhānakusalatā.
<< 2.3.3.18 Sovacassatādukaup2.3.3.20 Samāpattikusalatāduka >>
